function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Relying solely on entrepreneurial initiative to fix economic damage triggered by lockdown measures","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Perceived mismatch between startup characteristics and government support services can lead to a lack of access to necessary resources for maintaining health and safety standards.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cognizance of customers’ shifting needs may lead to increased risk of disease spread if startups are unable to adapt and respond to changes in customer behavior.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation and flexibility","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unpreparedness for the impact of covid-19 on entrepreneurial activities","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced sales and fixed costs threatening startups’ liquidity and long-term survival.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Economic climate is unfavorable for innovation due to the covid-19 crisis.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Barriers to accessing funding and plateau patterned growth due to gridlocked markets.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased effectiveness of travel restrictions in widespread outbreak","category":"Public Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balancing public health benefits with negative impacts on freedom of movement, economy, and society","category":"Public Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift in sex ratio of later cases without reported travel history","category":"Public Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cases with no known travel history contributing to disseminating sars-cov-2 outside of wuhan","category":"Public Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rising prevalence of loneliness during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Minimal attention on the issue of loneliness during previous pandemics sars and mers","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conceptualizing loneliness as a singular, unidimensional construct","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to capture the multidimensionality of loneliness","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Senior loneliness exacerbated by the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drastic reduction in theme 1 community impact of loneliness in europe, corresponding with rise in theme 3 mental health effect of loneliness","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in conducting traditional research methodologies such as surveys, interviews, and focus group discussions due to social distancing directives.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loneliness due to social distancing measures","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased prevalence of mental health outcomes during covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for global covid-19 response to detract from focus on climate action","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Doubts about effectiveness of european green deal egd in addressing climate crisis","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance and recalcitrance of coal-dependent member states","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global downturn and growing antagonisms between major powers","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of commitment to 2050 climate neutrality goal by member states","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Competing policy frames leading to conflicting approaches to climate and public health crises.","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on subsidiarity principle for eu-wide response to climate change impacts","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"National self-interest hindering european solutions","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential impediment to the implementation of the egd due to covid-19","category":"Global Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delayed initiatives and assessments due to covid-19","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporary lifting of state aid rules as part of initial economic response to covid-19 crisis","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The social and economic impacts of covid-19 can have widespread effects on livelihoods and economic stability in partner countries.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and accountability in government decisions","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Political exploitation of emergency powers for personal or party gain","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited press freedom and threat of jail time for reporting on the virus","category":"Freedom","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strict measures and lockdown may have been eased too early","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"State of emergency and unlimited power to rule by decree","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contested measures in the use of esm and austerity measures evoke memories of the punitive regime forced on greece during the eurozone crisis.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consolidation of authoritarian powers under president viktor orbán and the ruling fidesz party in hungary due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unequal economic responses to covid-19 crisis between prosperous and poorer eu member states.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Controversy over the use of corona bonds and the european stability mechanism esm to finance recoveries.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fraught and contested use of the european stability mechanism esm for financing emergency health costs.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inhibition of centralised control of medical countermeasures by member states’ insistence on separating health law and eu internal market law.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relative weakness of the ecdc compared to international counterparts , cdc and discrepancies between member state responses to covid-19.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Retreat to national self-interest in a time of crisis leading to discrepancies in member state responses to covid-19.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between public health authorities and governments","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in equipment sharing and resource allocation","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unplanned emergency response and lack of preparedness","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited eu health mandate hindered public health responses to covid-19","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium"}]}
